long_description: These Julbo Dolgan sunglasses let you confidentally take on the elements with strong glare and wind protection. Spectron 4 polycarbonate lenses block 100% of UV rays and 95% of visible light, reducing glare and creating a clear image. Durable, lightweight nylon frames come with built-in side shields, adding additional peripheral protection. Includes lanyard and hard case for storage.
short_description: These Julbo Dolgan sunglasses let you confidentally take on the elements with strong glare and wind protection.
